articles.author: Corpus Christi Caller Times, John C Moritz, Corpus Christi Caller Times
articles.title: Here's why the rise of detaining immigrant children was years in the making
articles.description: As federal officials scramble to house thousands of immigrant children, legal and social service providers scramble to keep up. Here's the stats.

articles.title: The Latest: Reporter kept from Secretary Alex Azar - mySanAntonio.com
articles.description:
HOMESTEAD, Fla. (AP) - The Latest on an immigration facility in Florida (all times local):
2:25 p.m.
A Department of Health and Human Services spokesman denied an Associated Press reporter access to Secretary Alex Azar while he was at a Miami hospital.

articles.title: McAllen man sentenced on drug, money laundering charges
articles.description: A federal District Judge sentenced a McAllen man to 10 years in prison for his role in a drug and money laundering conspiracy.

articles.author: Daniela Sternitzky-Di Napoli, Houston Chronicle
articles.title: Actor Jeremy London arrested for domestic violence after dispute with wife, Juliet Reeves
articles.description: "Mallrats" actor, Jeremy London was arrested in the front yard of his Mississippi home on Friday, Feb. 2, 2018, for domestic violence after a dispute with his wife, Juliet Reeves.

articles.author: Daniela Sternitzky-Di Napoli, Houston Chronicle
articles.title: Former Disney star Adam Hicks arrested in connection to 'string of armed robberies'
articles.description: The former star of Disney Channel's "Zeke and Luther," Adam Hicks, who played Luther, and his girlfriend, Danni Tamburo, were arrested on Wednesday, Jan. 24, 2018 on suspicion of committing several armed robberies.
